Metaphone 3

Project Metaphone 3 Toolkit

Class Summary
(Metaphone 3 Toolkit globals)  
HomeophoneEngine The Homeophone Engine is a class that takes a search string, which is presumed to be a correctly or incorrectly spelled english word, or a name that might be familiar to americans, and returns a ranked list of words found in its dictionary that are calculated to sound similar, according to a programmer-variable definition of similarity.
Metaphone3 Metaphone 3 is designed to return an approximate phonetic key (and an alternate approximate phonetic key when appropriate) that should be the same for english words, and most names familiar in the United States, that are pronounced "similarly".
scoredHomeophone The scoredHomeophone class is a data class designed to wrap a word which is a homeophone of the initial search string, its edit distance (Levenshtein distance) score from this initial search string, and a definition, if any.
